pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Tammam Salam of Lebanon | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke today with Prime Minister Tammam Salam of Lebanon.

Prime Minister Salam congratulated Prime Minister Trudeau on his election victory.

Prime Minister Trudeau reaffirmed Canadaâ€™s long-standing friendship with Lebanon and highlighted the strong people-to-people ties between the two nations.

Both leaders agreed to work together to support the resettlement of Lebanon-based Syrian refugees to Canada.

The prime ministers concluded by saying they would like to meet at the earliest opportunity.
